sen.j: 炉端焼き（ろばたやき）は、宮城県仙台市で発祥し、北海道釧路市で発展した飲食店の店舗や給仕の形態、および、そこで出される料理のこと。
sen.e: Robatayaki refers to the style of premises and serving at restaurants, which originated in Sendai City, Miyagi Prefecture and developed in Kushiro City, Hokkaido, as well as the dishes served there.

sen.j: 客の目の前の囲炉裏端において、炭火で魚介類や野菜を焼き、長いしゃもじ（掘返べら）で料理を運ぶ。
sen.e: Seafood and vegetables are grilled over charcoal fire by the side of irori fireplace (open hearth) in front of customers, and dishes are placed on long shamoji (long spoon or spatula) and carried to the customers.

sen.j: この形態の店は、昭和40年代には全国に1万店以上あったと言われる。
sen.e: It is said that around 1970's, there were over ten thousand restaurants of this style across the country.

sen.j: 仙台市の歓楽街「国分町 (仙台市)」にある「炉ばた」との店名の店において、採れた野菜を囲炉裏端で焼いて客に出していたのが発祥とされる。
sen.e: It is said to have originated at a restaurant named "Robata" in the nightlife district called "Kokubu-cho Town" in Sendai City, in which local vegetables were grilled over irori fireplace and served to customers.
sen.cmt: Webで確認し【（仙台市）】を削除しました。
sen.e: It is said to have originated that the local vegetables were grilled over irori fireplace and served to customers at a restaurant named 'Robata' in the nightlife district called 'Kokubu-cho Town,' in Sendai City.

sen.e: It is said to have originated that the local vegetables were grilled over irori fireplace and served to customers at a restaurant named 'Robata' in the nightlife district called 'Kokubu-cho Town,' in Sendai City.

sen.j: その後、「炉ばた」の一番弟子が大阪府で、二番弟子が北海道釧路市栄町で、ほか3名の弟子が東北地方の青森県や福島県などで炉端焼きの店を出した（大阪の店は既に閉店）。
sen.e: Later the best apprentice at "Robata" opened a restaurant in Osaka, and the second best apprentice at Sakaemachi, Kushiro City, Hokkaido, and other three apprentices in Aomori Prefecture, Fukushima Prefecture, etc. in Tohoku region (the restaurant in Osaka is already closed).

sen.j: 釧路の弟子は仙台と同様に「炉ばた」との店名で店を出し、釧路港で揚がる魚介類も焼いて出すようになった。
sen.e: The apprentice in Kushiro City gave his restaurant the name "Robata" like the restaurant in Sendai City, and came to serve grilled seafood, which were caught at Kushiro Port, as well.
The apprentice in Kushiro City opened his restaurant named 'Robata,' same as the restaurant in Sendai City, and started to serve also grilled seafood, which were caught at Kushiro Port.

sen.j: この釧路の「炉ばた」のメニューを踏襲した形で、日本各地に炉端焼きの店が広がったとされる。
sen.e: It is said that robatayaki restaurants expanded to various places across the country by following the menus of "Robata" in Kushiro City.

sen.j: 炉端焼きには仙台発祥と釧路発祥の2つの俗説があるものの、以上の経緯は両店で共通認識となっている。
sen.e: While there are two popular beliefs as to the origin of robatayaki, one being Sendai and the other being Kushiro, the above-described circumstances are commonly recognized by both restaurants.

sen.j: 釧路の「炉ばた」の数軒隣に、唐揚げザンギの発祥の店と言われている唐揚げ屋「鳥松」が存在する。
